data.title: Cloth Bags "Souvenirs from Madrid"
data.meta_description:
"Souvenirs of Madrid" Cloth Bags, very practical and comfortable cloth bags to carry as souvenirs, various models: Las Ventas de Madrid, the most emblematic monuments such as El oso y el Madroño, La Cibeles, La Puerta de Alcalá, Sol or the Madrid subway. Cold water wash.
Measurements: 39.5 cm. x 35.5cm. 73.5cm. long with handles
data.text:
Las Ventas (Madrid) bullring replica

Resin replica of the arena or bullring of Las Ventas, in Madrid. It has 4.9'' in diameter and 2.1'' high on the front door side. If you like the arena in Madrid.

Cibeles fountain (Madrid) replica

Resin replica of the Cibeles fountain in Madrid. The base measures 4.3'' and 2.3'' tall at the highest part. On a wooden pedestal with a plaque that puts Madrid. Packed in PVC box. Item for events, it can be customized at the base.

"Bear and strawberry tree" Statue of Madrid

Figure of the bear and the strawberry tree in black, with ivory color base and the inscription MADRID, comes in a transparent box. Made of polyresin. For corporate gifts, events or to take a nice souvenir of your visit to Madrid. Comes with a brief history about why the bear and the tree in the shield of Madrid. Measurements: 8,50 cm wide x 10 cm high and...

Mug "Las Ventas bullring"

Mug "Plaza de toros de Las Ventas" ceramic mug, with a design of the Las Ventas bullring, in Madrid. Dishwasher and microwave safe, food use capacity 300 ml. Measurements: 9.5 cm. high x 8 cm. diameter.

Fan "Madrid" collection

Wooden fan "Madrid" collection, high quality and very original, is the ideal gift for events, weddings ... You can see La Cibeles, Neptuno fountain, Puerta de Alcalá, Bernabeu stadium, Oso and Madroño ... Souvenirs of Madrid. It is presented in a gift box.

Two-tone Madrid visor cap

Two-tone Madrid visor cap, unisex cap, adjustable to any head size, it has two colors on the visor combined with the head, Madrid inscription and with a worn look.

Backpack Bag "Monuments of Madrid"

Large capacity "Monuments of Madrid" backpack, rectangular shape and drawstrings to adjust, with a design of emblematic Madrid Monuments, the bear and the strawberry tree, La Cibeles, Plaza Mayor, Royal Palace and Puerta de Alcalá, bears the coat of arms of Madrid . Measurements: 41.5 x 31.5 cm. Composition: 100% polyester.

Christmas ball "Meninas trencadis"

Christmas ball for the tree "Meninas trencadis", to decorate the Christmas tree or remove it as a treat to a familiar, this PVC bola, lleva lazo to colgar. Come in a cardboard box to protect it. Madrid souvenirs. Diameter: 7.5 cm

Monuments of Madrid coasters

Set six coasters with monuments in and around Madrid. Made in wood and plastic six different images, we have many models (in color and sepia with antique look). They are square with rounded tips and measured 3.7 x 3.7''Click "More details" to read something important.

Nativity in the "Puerta de Alcala"

Nativity in miniature "Puerta de Alcala" made of resin. This beautiful birth is perfect to decorate at home or take as a gift to a family member or friend who is abroad. Measures: 8.5 cm base x 7 cm high (in three pieces: The door, the child Jesus, the Virgin and Saint Joseph)

Salt and pepper set "Bull & Sun mosaic" Trencadis

Salt and Pepper Set, made in ceramic with "Bull & Sun" mosaic design, inspired by the Trencadís technique. It comes in a transparent blister box. Dishwasher safe Measures: 9 cm x 4 cm

Bear and "madroño" tree clip note

Support for notes with a bear and a madroño tree. It is made of resin and has a clip to hold the notes. It measures 3.9'' tall and comes in a hard clear plastic case. Souvenir from Madrid.

Replica of the Virgin of Almudena (Madrid)

Replica of the Virgin of Almudena (Virgen de la Almudena) or Our Lady of Almudena (Nuestra señora de la Almudena), patroness of Madrid. Made of resin.Dimensions: Large: 20 cm high Medium: 15 cm high Small: 9 cm high Did you know that...?La Virgen de la Almudena is an invocation of the Virgin Mary. Venerated in the...

Madrid monuments snowball

Glass snow balls with the figure of the oso and the madroño tree, Alcalá Gate or Cibeles fountain inside. Base and figures made of resin. Perfect as a gift or souvenir from your visit to Madrid. Size: 3.1'' in diameter (base) x 3.5''The bases of these balls have different designs and may vary from those shown in the photographs.

Bracelet "National Police"

Fabric bracelet of the "National Police" for her and for him. It is one size fits all and is closed with a zamak knot, bow or ball, as a pin that is included. Measurements: 30 cm by 1.5 wide and has the pin

Madrid monuments collage

Resin replica of the most important monuments of Madrid: Royal Palace (Palacio Real), Cibeles fountain, the Oso y madroño figure, Alcala gate (Puerta de Alcalá), Plaza Mayor, lions of Congress (Daoiz and Velarde) and Central Post Office. It's a great gift or souvenir of Madrid for events. Dimensions: 4.9 x 4.9''
